en-US.name: Reset bankroll
en-US.summary: Automatically reset your bankroll when you go bust
en-US.description: This subscription will immediately add 100 coins to your Slot Machine bankroll when you run out of coins so you don't have to wait until the next day to continue playing.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: This subscription will reset your bankroll every time you run out of coins.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Congratulations! Slot Machine will now reset your bankroll to 100 coins whenever you run out of coins.

testingInstructions: If you purchase this subscription, your bankroll will automatically reset every time you run out of coins, as opposed to having to wait until the following day to get more coins.
